title: If Empowered Committee as per Govt
clause_text: If Empowered Committee as per Govt. GR dated 30/03/2016 approves areas for amenities such as Fire Stations/Hospitals/Police Stations/Schools, etc. other than the reservations/designations under the Development Plan, such amenities shall be handed over to the Planning Authority free of cost and the BUA of such amenity shall be considered towards rehabilitation F.S.I, and Incentive FSI as admissible under this Regulation shall be permissible.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-
